meanings.definition: A small metal disk used in coin production.
meanings.sent1: The planchet was carefully inspected before being stamped into a coin.
meanings.sent2: The mint workers prepared the planchet for the coin press.
meanings.sent3: The planchet rolled off the table and caused a comical clatter.
meanings.sent4: The planchet transformed from a simple disk to a shiny coin.
meanings.sent5: The planchet gleamed under the bright lights of the mint.

meanings.definition: A blank metal disc used for stamping coins.
meanings.sent1: The shiny planchet awaited its turn to become a coin.
meanings.sent2: The planchet was carefully placed in the coin press.
meanings.sent3: The planchet played hide-and-seek with the mint workers.
meanings.sent4: The planchet was like a canvas waiting for the coin design.
meanings.sent5: The planchet held the promise of becoming a valuable coin.

meanings.definition: The flat metal piece on which a coin is struck.
meanings.sent1: The planchet was the foundation for the new coin.
meanings.sent2: The mint workers examined the planchet for imperfections.
meanings.sent3: The planchet pretended to be a tiny shield for the coin.
meanings.sent4: The planchet echoed with the sound of the coin press.
meanings.sent5: The planchet bore the imprint of the coin design.
